name: Dylan Dog 6: Maelstrom
overview: The keepers are falling one by one. Witches, wizards and occultists from all over the world are murdered by a mysterious Angel of a Thousand Faces. Blonde Kim - an old acquaintance of Dylan's - and her magical cat Cagliostro are the last ones left. But what do they keep? The Maelstrom, a black vortex, is a door to Hell, which opens every six hundred and sixty-six years. This time cosmic forces are at stake and the Investigator must decide who to trust: the witch Kim or the Exterminating Angel?
